trans-unit.source: Represents the specifications, such as the WS-*specifications, that security tokens are defined in.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta le specifiche, ad esempio WS-* specifiche, definiti in token di sicurezza.

trans-unit.source: Use the SecurityTokenVersion class to determine which version of the WS-* specifications that security tokens confirm to in a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la classe SecurityTokenVersion per determinare la versione di WS-* specifiche che si conformano i token di sicurezza in un messaggio SOAP.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager.CreateSecurityTokenSerializer%28System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion%29> method to create a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> that is capable of serializing and deserializing security tokens according to the set of specifications that are associated with a class deriving from the SecurityTokenVersion class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager.CreateSecurityTokenSerializer%28System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion%29>metodo per creare un <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>che Ã¨ in grado di supportare la serializzazione e deserializzazione dei token di sicurezza in base al set di specifiche associate a una classe che deriva dalla classe SecurityTokenVersion.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager.CreateSecurityTokenSerializer%28System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenVersion"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of supported security specifications.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di specifiche di sicurezza supportati.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains the set of supported security specifications.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> di tipo <xref:System.String>che contiene il set di specifiche di sicurezza supportate.</xref:System.String>
